name: Bank Manager City Cashier
description:
In Bank Manager City Cashier: Cash Register games includes the latest technology systems
that has vastly improved the banking system around the world to satisfy customer’s needs.
This amazing cash register game will let you experience how the bank procedures are done.
As bank manager city cashier you have to deal the customers arriving quickly to fulfill
their demands. In the professional role of bank manager make sure you accurately do all
the number calculations and take right amount of cash. All the children who number lovers
lets play the best bank manager cashier cash register game 2018!

Features of Cash Register Game:
• Professional Bank Management Cashier Game
• Addictive level based money calculation gameplay
• Experience the real time Bank Procedures
• Utilize latest technology system
• Cash handling with time management in real-time Bank
• beautiful quality graphics
